My Projects

    Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing

    Intention: Explore the possibilities of implementing a Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing system via the Chord algorithm.

    Magic Realm

    The goal: Create a networked, multiplayer version of the classic board game Magic Realm. Allow users to travel across the board, find gold, engage in combat and fight ghosts.

    gradecalc.co

    The goal: Create a simple application to let students and instructors calculate their grades. I want users to be able to create profiles where their grades are saved for each of their classes. Each time the user visits the site they simply input whatever new grade they received and their new mark will be updated. Using this, they’ll know how hard they’ll have to study on the final exam to receive an A+.

    filiptodoric.com

    The goal: Make a simple website to where people can get to know me, and learn about my ongoing projects.

    Python File Transfer System

    The goal: Make a multi-platform Bash inspired file transfer system. Using native bash commands, the user should be able to add, get and create files/directories on the server from the client computer.
